title: Pyke doesn't receive HP from items or runes
body: I was playing Pyke today and I noticed at lvl 14 with black cleaver and other items meant to give HP I was still stuck at 1810 HP. I tried this out in the practice tool later and it was the same case over again stuck at base hp with no extra HP given by items nor runes. Please fix this

replies.body: So, where'd you buy that account? Level 150 but no knowledge of Pyke whatsoever? That's hard to believe.

have you tried reading his abilities bruv?
you are lvl 180 im convinced you are trolling

This is not a bug. Read his passive.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Pyke
I thought by now people actually read what each champion passive and abilities do, I thought wrong.

I'm sorry, but that's an intentional weaknesses that Pyke cannot improve his HP from items and what not, build in his passive, to counter his grey health healing. When you start playing a new champion, don't you, you know, read what his abilities and most importantly his passive do?
